creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 5/8 in. (36.5 × 24.5 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban) each sheet
inscription: Charcters' names written next to figures; right: {Banzui Chōbe} | left: {Shirai Gonpachi}
markings: censor seals: Kinugasa, Watanabe; publisher's seal:
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: right:  一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga} | left: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Kakitsubata tamuke no Hanakawado 杜若手向花川戸, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1850, 3rd month.
title: Actors Ichikawa Ebizō V as Banzui Chōbei (R) and Iwai Kumesaburō III as Shirai Gonpachi (L)
